course_title: Contextual Education Elective - Texts of Terror: Strategies for Interpreting Troublesome Texts
class_notes: (ONLINE) (For students who entered the MDiv prior to Fall 2023 only; Concurrent enrollment in CE 552B or teaching parish or EASP Con Ed required; permission number required to enroll; request permission by emailing candlerregistrar@emory.edu beginning October 23 at Noon eastern time)
course_description: A course focusing on biblical texts that deeply trouble us, causing us outrage or pain, contextualized for students serving in ecclesial placements during contextual education II.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5457, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 6-8p, Instructor: J. Wright, Status: Closed
